feed.title: SA Country Fire Service Warning Messages

info.headline: Bushfire Watch and Act : MCLAREN VALE
info.description: CFS advises situation at the bushfire at McLaren Vale TEST on the Fleurieu Peninsula near Main Road and Mudge Street may change and threaten your safety. CFS expects that a change in the wind direction or fuel type at approximately 11:00am may cause the fire to change direction or accelerate and move towards Reeves Street, McLaren Vale near Reeves Street. People in this area may be threatened by this fire from now. Check and follow your Bushfire Survival Plan. If your plan is to leave or you are not prepared, leave now. Well prepared and actively defended homes can offer safety. You should not enter this area as the roads may not be safe. Stay tuned to our emergency broadcast partners on a battery-powered radio for updates. For information about bushfires, check the CFS website www.cfs.sa.gov.au or call the Bushfire Information Hotline 1300 362 361.
info.instruction: Check and follow your Bushfire Survival Plan. If your plan is to leave or you are not prepared, leave now. You should not enter this area as the roads may not be safe.

area.areaDesc: McLaren Vale TEST on the Fleurieu Peninsula
